answers.answer: Are you having much swelling? Is your blood pressure at a safe level? preeclampsia comes to mind.  I'd be calling my OB immediately, if I were you.

Not swelling at all and my blood pressure has always come back normal at my doctor visits. I wouldn't know if it's at a good level now though cause I'm not able to check it at home. I most definitely will give her a call tomorrow though. Thank you!

question: I'm 38+2 and have been feeling my belly as hard as a rock. I have a terrible headache that not even Tylenol takes away and feel very nauseas, dizzy, out of breath. Simply terrible. Has anyone been through this?
title: Terrible headache & belly as hard as a rock!
